channel.title: Miro Updates
channel.description: New releases of Miro with downloadable enclosures.

item.title: 0.9.8.1 Update Available
item.description:
Update Available

We have just released a small update to Miro. This new version fixes several relatively minor or unusual bugs and is recommended for all users.

Bug Fixes in Version 0.9.8.1

  • Fixes the Options panel on non-English Windows installations.
  • Fixes migration problem on Mac that could disassociate videos from channels.
  • Fixes an application hang for Mac 10.3.9 users who have updated to QuickTime 7.2.
  • Miro now pauses video playback when minimizing on Windows.
  • Fixes issues with fullscreen mode on Windows Vista.
  • Fixes a problem with dual monitors on Windows.

For help with any problems, please visit GetMiro.com/help and GetMiro.com/forum.
